title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist has no suggestions, the file remains unchanged, but it is currently being marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirty the file.
SR: Ensure that the code assist mechanism checks for available suggestions before marking the file as dirty. Update the logic to avoid unnecessary dirtiness when there are no code assist suggestions.
